item.title: 718 pkp help please?
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Hey i used this code (made by bandoswhips
Code:
public void increaseKillCount(Player killed) {
killed.deathCount++;
PkRank.checkRank(killed);
if (killed.getSession().getIP().equals(getSession().getIP()))
return;
getInventory().addItem(12852, 10);
killCount++;
getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=ff0000>You have killed " + killed.getDisplayName() + “, you have now " + killCount + " kills.”);
PkRank.checkRank(this);
}
But is there a way that i can make it so i don’t get items from it but i get points added to my account and it like goes you have gained 10 pkp and not an item? any help and what do i do in unpackshops.txt to add it in the shop? thanks!

Read full topic
